content.rendered:
Danny McMillan worked in the music industry for years. From about 2008, he created a website and was responsible for managing that site including running Pay Per Click Traffic. In 2015, Danny started selling on Amazon. In 2016 he launched Seller Sessions, which started as a YouTube channel then became a podcast. It focusses on helping more advanced Amazon sellers.

Interviews

272 Amazon Advertising Strategy for Advanced Sellers with Danny McMillan Part 2 of 2
Other software for Amazon ads management is rules-based and are very inflexible – it’s a one size fits all solution for Amazon advertising strategy.

271 Sponsored Ads for Advanced Sellers with Danny McMillan Part 1 of 2
Today we will be talking about sponsored ads with Danny McMillan worked in the music industry for years. From about 2008, he created a website and was responsible for managing that site including running Pay Per Click Traffic. In 2015, Danny started selling on Amazon. In 2016 he launched Seller Sessions, which started as a YouTube channel then became a podcast. It focusses on helping more advanced Amazon sellers.

62 How to do The Canton Fair with Danny McMillan – Part 2 of 2
When people don’t plan at all and they get lost and lose their time. Once a phase is over, it’s over. So if you don’t plan out where you need to be you very well may end up missing out on what you went there for. By taking 10 minutes to plan out where you need to be at what time, you can save yourself hours.

61 The Canton Fair – Lessons Learned – with Danny McMillan – Part 1 of 2
The Canton Fair is basically a trade fair with suppliers that takes place in April and October. It takes place over three phases and is the largest fair of its kind. To put it in perspective the rough estimate is that it’s about the size of five NFL stadiums. Each phase has different product verticals and you decide with ones you want to go to depending on your categories. The Canton Fair has roughly 20,000 stands and an average of 200,000 people for each phase.

32 Amazon Ads Specialist Danny McMillan- PART TWO
This Episode, #32, is the second half of an interview that was prompted by our very own Facebook members! They said in a survey that Amazon Ads were the area they most wanted expert help with. Danny McMillan, himself a member of the group, responded by giving many golden nuggets to our listeners.

31 Amazon Ads Specialist Danny McMillan Interview – PART ONE
This Episode, #31, was prompted by our very own Facebook members! They said in a survey that Amazon Ads were the area they most wanted expert help with. Danny McMillan responded by giving many golden nuggets to our listeners.

Amazon Ads Notes
The goal here is the reduce your time spent optimising your campaigns and limit the confusion of endless undocumented tweaking.
